actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery at Fort Richardson, Alaska.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to establish a national cemetery at Fort Richardson, Alaska, on lands transferred to him by the Secretary of the Army. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as are necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery at Fort Richardson, Alaska.
